member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides extention methods for working with strings.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to its hash value using MD5 algorithm.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the stinrg to boolean value.
member.returns: The boolean value of the string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to Int16 number.
member.returns: The Int16 value of the string or the defult value of Int16 if the operation failed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to Int32 number.
member.returns: The Int32 value of the string or the defult value of Int32 if the operation failed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to Int64 number.
member.returns: The Int64 value of the string or the defult value of Int64 if the operation failed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.returns: The DateTime value of the string or the defult value of DateTime if the operation failed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Makes the first charachter of the string capitalized.
member.returns: The string with its first charachter capitalized.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds a substring between given strings.
member.param: The string to be searched for.
Index to start from the search
member.returns: The substrings between two strings or string.Empty.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string with Cyrillic letters to a string with Latin letters.
member.returns: The string with its Cyrillic letters converted to Latin letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string with Latin letters to a string with Cyrillic letters.
member.returns: The string with its Latin letters converted to Cyrillic letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid latin user name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid latin file name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: The string to get characters from

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension of a string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a file extension string to content type string.
member.returns: The content type of a file extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a byte array.
